title: Tryndamere needs a nerf. BADLY
body:
Tryndamere is fucking bullshit
He requires no skill to play, he is an easy champion to play his skillset is easier than Yi's and his scaling is fucking broken
Lets take a look at this real quick

His Q can heal him for upwards of 2000 health if you build him as AP or 800 if your AD, and gives him up to 90 bonus AD
His W takes away 60 PERCENT MOVEMENT SPEED AND 90 AD FOR 4 SECONDS
His E has 1.2 scaling with AD and 1:1 with AP and only has a 9 second cooldown with no items
And his R is completely broken, not because of what it does but because of the cooldown, every 1 minute and 30 seconds with no cooldown, Trynd cant fucking die by anything except for spawn laser.
Some suggested changes:

-Remove his heal scaling with AP altogether, increase the cooldown and reduce the scaling of HP per point of Fury
-Change his W slow to last 2.5 seconds and only reduce a maximum of 70 AD
-Remove his scaling with AP on the E and shorten the cooldown but remove the "every crit reduces cooldown" bullshit
-Increase his ult cooldown to 130 seconds at all ranks so that players have to purchase CDR instead of having a bullshit 100% crit chance with 400 AD, and have it last for less time, cause 5 seconds is way to fucking long

You dont have to change any of these, but keep in mind, trynd is ruining this Game

yer but if you don't try and fight with him then he can just stop you from getting cs I find that the best way to lane with him is to get to 6 and help mid bot ect only way lol

I'm happy to verse him with Gnar and Shyvana, even Riven have success versing him. He can be nasty but all 3 of these Champions have good early game aggression, strong AOE and all have some form of getting out of bad situations to some extent.

I usually smash Yorick's, he lost a lot of his power with his nerfs after release because he was strong as an AD and when Champions had lower movespeed and when the game was more static - he's relatively weak early and now it's easier to punish him because of the way league is.
Run exhaust against him, it's 5 times as good as ignite because even late game you have just destroyed his engage damage. Renders him completely useless.

I feel like this is obvious but you could run ignite?
Cast it a few seconds after he ults, try to time it for around when you think his invincibility will run out. It'll reduce the heal from his Q and if he escapes on low HP your ignite should pick up the kill.

If his W annoys you try playing an AP Bruiser/Tank and you won't have to worry about that AD reduction. Depending on the champ you are you could try grabbing Morello's, reduces his lifesteal and Q heal. You could grab a Zhonya's too and stall out his ult. 
Or just grab a damn Randuin's Omen... 10% less damage now from crits, some nice HP and armor, Unique Passive: Cold Steel and the active slow? You're set.

Yes Trynd might be strong but he is by far not the most broken champ out there, I don't think he'll be getting any of Riot's attention anytime soon so I'd start looking at ways to counter him ^^ You'll find there's quite a few if you really think about it.

He is by far strongest late game so try to crush him early :^)

TBH the only way so far i've found to counter him which is successful is using 3 members of the team to CC him while in his ult, but that 5 seconds where he takes no damage is basically a big fuck you to your team in a team fight

I often Tryndamere one handed and still carry 15-0.

Even in lane phase.

I love split pushing with Tryndamere when I have ghost Ignite as Summoner's because no one bothers coming and you just slowly split push for the win cause if they do come you just Ghost like a mother f*cker and dash over a wall and you are home scott free unless all 5 come for you - but when all 5 come for you, your ADC usually knows and just split pushes bot.

Split push based god, could win one handed with this Champion and have, Counters BS as f*ck Yi.

Possible counters include: Zhonya's, Kayle ultimates and ultimate kite fests or warwicks.
